#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
main()
{
	int t, n, j, i, ans;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;

		int arr[n/2+1];
		arr[0] = 0;
		arr[1] = 1;
		i = 2;
		while ( i <= n / 2)
		{
			arr[i] = 1;
			i++;
		}
		i = 2;
		while ( i <= n / 2)
		{
			if ( n % i == 0)
			{
				j = i;
				while (j <= n / 2)
				{
					arr[j] = 0;
					j += i;
				}
			}
			i++;
		}
		i = 2;
		ans = 1;
		while (i <= n / 2)
		{
				if (arr[i]) ans++;
			i++;
		}

		ans = ans * 2;
		if(n == 2) ans = 1;
		
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
}
